content: It sounds like we really need to form some kind of policy or least suggestions around how we stabilize MIR optimizations and perhaps communicate that to the wider compiler team for transparency. Is this something we should have a synchronous meeting for or perhaps something we should draft async?
I think we can draft it async and then hold a mtg in the end
Are you (or anyone reading) interested in giving initial input or should I draft something and we can go from there?
I think we should include tmiasko (I only know their git handle) from the get go, but I can draw up an initial draft
@TM do you want to draft or help draft an initial document or would you rather me draft it and then comment on it?
Awesome! I'm very willing to help with the initial draft as well. I didn't mean to volunteer you for additional work @oli :smile:
I tried lowercase, but the zulip app corrects it after sending the message
